content:
path /v3/ethereum/block/current
operationId EthGetCurrentBlock
parameters
description Type of Ethereum testnet Defaults to ethereumsepolia
in header
name xtestnettype
required False
schema
default ethereumsepolia
type string
summary Get current block number
description 1 credit per API callGets the current Ethereum block number This is the number of the latest block in the blockchain
responses
200
schema
type number
description Current block number
description OK
